lines: series 680-10 product bulletin - 3m scotchlite reflective graphic film(pdf,829.5kb)
designed for screen printing and electrostatic printing.
csd graphic materials catalog low-res version(pdf,3.6mb)
available in numerous colors, including black (which reflects white)
doesn't reflect at all, used 3x and always the same result.
3m(tm) scotchlite(tm) reflective graphic film - ruby red
red film with a typical coefficient of retroreflection of 20
meets astm d 4956 07 for type 1 sheeting (section 6.1.1) and nfpa requirements

most people should know that reflective only really reflects or "pops" at night.i've used a lot of this on buses for a large charter bus line.they love it.at night it positively glows white or silver with very little light.
for vertical, flat, curved or corrugated surfaces, with or without rivets
3m scotchlite reflective graphic film 680-72, red, 24 in x 50 yd, 1roll/case
